seed_pair: 他很安静。
He was quiet.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'He was' → '他' needs verb context (was=quiet state). 'quiet' → '安静' ✅ passes but too granular. 'He was quiet' → '他很安静' ✅ FD passes (complete thought). BACKWARD SWEEP: '安静' alone = uncertain (adjective needs context), '很安静' = still needs subject, '他很安静' = complete ✅. HEURISTIC 1: Single complete statement removes all uncertainty. HEURISTIC 2: No overlaps needed - simple sentence.

seed_pair: 不，你离开后他相当安静。
No he was rather quiet after you left.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'No' → '不' ✅ simple. 'he was rather quiet' → '他相当安静' (similar to S0361 but 'rather'='相当'). 'after you left' → '你离开后' ✅ FD passes (temporal clause). BACKWARD SWEEP: '后' needs context, '离开后' needs subject, '你离开后' ✅ complete. HEURISTIC 1: '后' alone = uncertain particle, needs verb. HEURISTIC 2: Create overlap with '离开后' to show particle pattern.

seed_pair: 是的，他想说很多话。
Yes he felt like talking a lot.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'Yes' → '是的' ✅. 'he felt like talking' → '他想说' - 'felt like' is rendered as '想' (want to). 'a lot' → '很多话' (many words). BACKWARD SWEEP: '话' alone = word/speech but needs quantifier, '很多话' ✅ complete, '说很多话' ✅ verb phrase. HEURISTIC 1: '话' needs context, wrap in '很多话'. HEURISTIC 2: Create '想说' AND '说很多话' overlap to maximize verb patterns.

seed_pair: 我听说他不喜欢那个地方。
I heard that he didn't like that place.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I heard that' → '我听说' ✅ complete clause introducer. 'he didn't like' → '他不喜欢' ✅. 'that place' → '那个地方' ✅. BACKWARD SWEEP: '地方' = place but needs determiner, '个地方' needs '那', '那个地方' ✅ complete. HEURISTIC 1: Measure word '个' needs context. HEURISTIC 2: Create overlap '不喜欢那个地方' to show verb-object pattern.

seed_pair: 我没听到她对他说了什么。
I didn't hear what she said to him.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I didn't hear' → '我没听到' ✅. 'what she said' → '她说了什么' ✅. 'to him' → '对他' ✅ but note word order. BACKWARD SWEEP: '什么' alone = what but needs verb context, works in '说了什么'. '对他说' shows Chinese pattern (to-him-say vs say-to-him). HEURISTIC 1: '对' alone = uncertain preposition. HEURISTIC 2: Create '对他说' to show dative pattern, AND '说了什么' for question pattern.

seed_pair: 你听到他想种什么了吗？
Did you hear what he wanted to grow?
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'Did you hear' → '你听到...了吗' (split question frame). 'what he wanted to grow' → '他想种什么' ✅. BACKWARD SWEEP: '吗' = question particle, needs full question. '了吗' = question frame. HEURISTIC 1: '吗' alone = uncertain particle. HEURISTIC 2: Create '想种' verb pattern AND '种什么' to show grow-what pattern, overlapping on '种'.

seed_pair: 不，没人告诉我。
No nobody told me.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'No' → '不' ✅. 'nobody told me' → '没人告诉我' ✅ complete clause. BACKWARD SWEEP: '我' alone = I/me but needs verb, '告诉我' ✅ told me. HEURISTIC 1: '我' needs verb context. HEURISTIC 2: Create '没人' (nobody) AND '告诉我' to show negative subject pattern and verb-object.

seed_pair: 是的，我听说他想种西红柿。
Yes I heard that he wanted to grow tomatoes.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'Yes' → '是的' ✅. 'I heard that' → '我听说' ✅ (from S0364). 'he wanted to grow' → '他想种' (from S0366). 'tomatoes' → '西红柿' ✅. BACKWARD SWEEP: '柿' alone = persimmon but needs full compound, '红柿' incomplete, '西红柿' ✅ complete word. HEURISTIC 1: Compound words stay together. HEURISTIC 2: Leverage overlap from S0366 '他想种'.

seed_pair: 我在路上看到了几匹马。
I saw several horses on the road.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I saw' → '我...看到了' (saw with aspect). 'several horses' → '几匹马' (measure word required). 'on the road' → '在路上' ✅. BACKWARD SWEEP: '马' alone = horse but needs measure word, '匹马' needs number, '几匹马' ✅ complete. '上' alone = on/up uncertain, '路上' ✅. HEURISTIC 1: Measure word '匹' needs context, '上' needs noun. HEURISTIC 2: Create '在路上' location pattern AND '看到了几匹马' to show object pattern.

seed_pair: 我没看到任何我认识的人。
I didn't see anyone that I knew.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I didn't see' → '我没看到' ✅. 'anyone that I knew' → '任何我认识的人' - complex relative clause. BACKWARD SWEEP: '人' alone = person but needs modifier, '的人' needs description, '认识的人' ✅ people I know, '我认识的人' ✅ complete. HEURISTIC 1: '的' alone = particle, needs both modifier and noun. HEURISTIC 2: Create '我认识的人' relative clause pattern AND '任何...的人' to show 'any...that' construction.
